used clothes. Every second,
a truck carrying textile garbage arrives here.
Once out of fashion, the clothes will be destroyed.
Massive disposal of fast fashion is a
cause of pollution that affects the land,
rivers and seas as well as the air. The
French House of Representatives has just passed a bill on
sanctioning fast fashion products to
minimize the impact of  against the

Ladies and gentlemen, District 7 police in
Ho Chi Minh City are investigating a fire that
occurred at a department store this
morning
around 6:00 a.m. This morning, people saw a
block of smoke spread out inside the department store.
green on Tran Xuan street, district 7, so
when the shop goes out, the
store staff is preparing to open. There are no
customers. I heard the news. The staff
inside the store have run away to
the public and protect the public.  Nearby residents
used fire extinguishers to put out the fire. The
fire prevention and fighting police team and the
District 7 police department sent vehicles and
officers and soldiers to the
scene to deploy firefighting efforts and then
extinguish them.  The fire caused a lot of glass to be
broken, some assets and goods inside the
store were burned and damaged.
